contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 2, 2019 D Gateway British Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
Gateway British Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 0 Other Gateway British Brass Band Festival gateway-british-brass-band-festival-cham-6546
Ritenour High School, St. Louis, Missouri, USA Caption Adjudicator: Dr. Jennifer Moder-Bell Best Cornets: Dublin Silver Band Best Horns: Arkansas MusicWorks Brass Band Best Baritone/Euphoniums: Dublin Silver Band Best Trombones: Tie - Dublin Silver Band & Chicago Brass Band Best Basses: Chicago Brass Band Best Percussion: Chicago Brass Band
Judging will be three adjudicators in the balcony of the auditorium behind a screen in secret as at NABBA. A fourth judge will adjudicate section awards in the open in the lower bowl of the auditorium. No communication will be allowed between judges. Literature is Own Choice but must be a minimum of 20 minutes. Timing of the performance will be from the 1st note of music to cut off of each piece performed. A 35 minute stage time is allotted each band with timing to begin when the 1st player steps on the performance area of the stage. Timing ceases when the last brass member exits the stage. Bands must have traditional brass band instrumentation. Each judge will record real time audio files. Awards will be directly following the close of the Championship Section competition by 5 pm.
Championship Section 12:45 pm Band A 1:30 pm Band B 2:15 pm Band C 3:00 pm Band D 3:45 pm Band E 4:45 pm Awards 6:00 pm Dinner
Band Adjudicators Dr. Sharon Huff Dr. Kenneth Kroesche Professor J.D. Shaw Section Adjudicators Dr. Jennifer Moder-Bell
Nov. 8, 2019, 1:21 p.m. Nov. 8, 2019, 1:47 p.m.
1 Chicago Brass Band Colin Holman
2 Eastern Iowa Brass Band Alexander Beamer
3 Dublin Silver Band Tim Jameson
4 Arkansas Musicworks Brass Band William Ratcliff
5 East Central University Brass Band Jace Vickers
